name: Content Marketing Email - Send Email
description: This test case's sole purpose is to trigger the NewHomesInsider and Price Reduction email campaigns, which should only be sent on Wednesdays and Fridays, respectively. It runs once per day. These emails are sent to a business-critical recipient list, making it essential to ensure they are only delivered on the appropriate days.

steps.note: Gets the day of week to use in the next steps
Send the NewHomesInsider Email Campaign if it's Wednesday.
Send the Price Reduction Email Campaign if it's Friday.

The assertion on this test should validate GeoState=MD and MarketState=DC. We are working on a more robust way to do it without relying on typeahead, which currently causes issues since National Harbor doesn't have any listing available
There's another county with the same name and state but on a different market.
There's another County with the same name and state, but on a different market.
